name: browse
description: Open a URL in the user's default web browser. This will launch the browser application and navigate to the specified webpage.

url.description: The complete URL to open in the browser. Must include the protocol (http:// or https://). Examples: 'https://www.google.com', 'https://github.com/user/repo', 'http://localhost:3000'. For local files, use file:// protocol: 'file:///home/user/document.html'.
